#summary LaTeX tips and tricks.
#labels Featured

= Formatting =

== Quote paragraphs ==
{{{
\begin{quotation}
\emph{Reality is whatever refuses to go away when I stop believing in it.}\\
\textbf{Philip K. Dick}
\end{quotation}
}}}

= Maths =

== Delimeters ==
|| Parentheses || `( )` || `\left ( \right )` ||
|| Brackets || `[ ]` || `\left [ \right ]` ||
|| Braces || `{ }` || `\left \{ \right \}` ||

= New styles =

== Abstract like style ==

{{{
\newenvironment{Resumen}
{
  \begin{center}\textbf{Resumen}\end{center}
  \begin{quote}
  \emph
  \bgroup
}
{
  \egroup
  \end{quote}
}
}}}
